title: Verify: MP-003 setup wizard and config-driven runtime
description: Verification story for MP-003. Test the wizard end-to-end and verify config changes work as expected.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Run ralph-config and complete wizard with runtime=bun
Run ralph and verify it attempts to use bun UI (or falls back gracefully)
Run ralph-config again, change to runtime=bash
Verify ralph uses bash UI after config change
Delete config.json, verify ralph prompts for setup
